prerequisites.supportedUseCase: Shows Azure resources covering encryption settings, guest access, and resource access to key vaults.

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find azure_managed_disk with attached=false and encrypted=true as a
return count(a) as value

queries.name: query1
queries.query: Find azure_managed_disk with attached=false and encrypted!=true as a return count(a) as value

widgets.title: Are any VHD's attached to VMs unencrypted?

queries.name: query1
queries.query: FIND azure_vm THAT USES azure_storage_account with encryptedBlob!=true as a return count(a) as value

widgets.title: Are any VMs missing the latest OS patches?

queries.name: query1
queries.query: FIND azure_vm THAT HAS azure_advisor_recommendation with recommendation^=("Apply system updates" OR 'apply system updates')

widgets.title: Are any Azure-managed OS / Boot disks unencrypted?

queries.name: query1
queries.query: Find azure_managed_disk with osType!=undefined and attached=true and encrypted!=true as a return count(a) as value

widgets.title: Are there Azure security group rules allowing inbound SSH access from the Internet?

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find azure_security_group that allows as rule Internet
where rule.inbound=true and rule.fromPort <= 22 and rule.toPort >= 22
return count(rule) as value

widgets.title: Are there any guest users with access to Azure?

queries.name: query1
queries.query: find azure_user with userType='Guest' and trusted!=true

widgets.title: Security contacts with no  email setup

queries.name: query1
queries.query: find azure_security_center_contact with name="default" and email!=undefined

widgets.title: Are any Azure storage accounts configured without "Deny" as the default network access rule?
What Azure resources are allow access to or from the Internet?

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
find Internet that allows as rule azure_security_group
  that protects * that (has|contains|connects|uses) *
return tree

widgets.title: Do any guest users have * access to the key vault?

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
FIND azure_keyvault_service
  (THAT HAS azure_resource_group)? 
  (THAT HAS azure_subscription)? 
  (THAT HAS azure_management_group)? 
  THAT ALLOWS azure_role_assignment WITH actions='*' 
  THAT ASSIGNED (azure_user|azure_group) WITH userType = 'Guest'
  (THAT HAS azure_user WITH userType = 'Guest')?
RETURN TREE

widgets.title: Are there any users that are granted direct access to resources?

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
FIND * as any_resource 
  (THAT HAS azure_resource_group)? 
  (THAT HAS azure_subscription)? 
  (THAT HAS azure_management_group)?
  THAT ALLOWS azure_role_assignment 
  THAT ASSIGNED azure_user
  RETURN TREE
  Limit 5

widgets.title: Which users, groups, or service principals are assigned a role that allows access to the Production key vault?

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
FIND azure_keyvault_service 
WITH tag.Production = true
    (THAT HAS azure_resource_group)? 
    (THAT HAS azure_subscription)? 
    (THAT HAS azure_management_group)? 
    THAT ALLOWS azure_role_assignment 
    THAT ASSIGNED 
      (azure_user|azure_user_group|azure_service_principal) as principal
RETURN TREE

widgets.title: Can any users or groups read the value of a secret in a key vault?

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
FIND azure_keyvault_service 
 (THAT HAS azure_resource_group)? 
 (THAT HAS azure_subscription)? 
 (THAT HAS azure_management_group)? 
 THAT ALLOWS azure_role_assignment WITH dataActions = 'Microsoft.KeyVault/vaults/secrets/getSecret/action' 
 THAT ASSIGNED (azure_user|azure_user_group)
RETURN TREE
